BR_text.BRsummary: Unclear error message when calculating jaccard and weighted_jaccard distance
BR_text.BRdescription:
For both jaccard and weighted_jaccard distances the following produces an unclear error:
 a = {'k': 'df'}
 b = {'j': 1}
 tc.toolkits.distances.jaccard(a, b)
 <denchmark-code>ToolkitError: stod: no conversion
 </denchmark-code>
 
 I would expect something similar to:
 <denchmark-code>ToolkitError: at least one of the dictionary values could not be converted to a number.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 This is especially confusing when using jaccard distance which does not consider the values of the dictionary.

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link>
   Please assign this ticket to me as I would like to try fixing it and contribute .Thanks in advance!
